body_html:
I am having the same/similar issue in Windows 7, using the same CMake instructions you linked above.

Compilation: MSBuild /p:Configuration=Release tf_tutorials_example_trainer.vcxproj

Errors:
"C:\Users\tjb3\tensorflow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build2\tf_tutorials_example_
trainer.vcxproj" (default target) (1) ->
"C:\Users\tjb3\tensorflow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build2\tf_core_gpu_kernels.v
cxproj" (default target) (113) ->
(CustomBuild target) ->
C:/Users/tjb3/tensorflow\tensorflow/core/kernels/reduction_ops_gpu_kernels.h(
179): error : argument list for template "cub::BlockReduce<T, BLOCK_DIM_X, ALGO
RITHM, BLOCK_DIM_Y, BLOCK_DIM_Z, PTX_ARCH>::Reduce [with T=std::iterator_traits
::value_type, BLOCK_DIM_X=num_threads, ALGORITHM=cub::BLOCK_REDUCE_WARP_REDU
CTIONS, BLOCK_DIM_Y=1, BLOCK_DIM_Z=1, PTX_ARCH=0]" is missing [C:\Users\tjb3\te
nsorflow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build2\tf_core_gpu_kernels.vcxproj]
C:/Users/tjb3/tensorflow\tensorflow/core/kernels/reduction_ops_gpu_kernels.h(
214): error : argument list for template "cub::WarpReduce<T, LOGICAL_WARP_THREA
DS, PTX_ARCH>::Reduce [with T=std::iterator_traits::value_type, LOGICAL_WARP
_THREADS=32, PTX_ARCH=0]" is missing [C:\Users\tjb3\tensorflow\tensorflow\contr
ib\cmake\build2\tf_core_gpu_kernels.vcxproj]

body:
I am having the same/similar issue in Windows 7, using the same CMake instructions you linked above.

Compilation: MSBuild /p:Configuration=Release tf_tutorials_example_trainer.vcxproj

Errors: 
"C:\Users\tjb3\tensorflow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build2\tf_tutorials_example_
trainer.vcxproj" (default target) (1) ->
"C:\Users\tjb3\tensorflow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build2\tf_core_gpu_kernels.v
cxproj" (default target) (113) ->
(CustomBuild target) ->
  C:/Users/tjb3/tensorflow\tensorflow/core/kernels/reduction_ops_gpu_kernels.h(
179): error : argument list for template "cub::BlockReduce<T, BLOCK_DIM_X, ALGO
RITHM, BLOCK_DIM_Y, BLOCK_DIM_Z, PTX_ARCH>::Reduce [with T=std::iterator_traits
<T>::value_type, BLOCK_DIM_X=num_threads, ALGORITHM=cub::BLOCK_REDUCE_WARP_REDU
CTIONS, BLOCK_DIM_Y=1, BLOCK_DIM_Z=1, PTX_ARCH=0]" is missing [C:\Users\tjb3\te
nsorflow\tensorflow\contrib\cmake\build2\tf_core_gpu_kernels.vcxproj]
  C:/Users/tjb3/tensorflow\tensorflow/core/kernels/reduction_ops_gpu_kernels.h(
214): error : argument list for template "cub::WarpReduce<T, LOGICAL_WARP_THREA
DS, PTX_ARCH>::Reduce [with T=std::iterator_traits<T>::value_type, LOGICAL_WARP
_THREADS=32, PTX_ARCH=0]" is missing [C:\Users\tjb3\tensorflow\tensorflow\contr
ib\cmake\build2\tf_core_gpu_kernels.vcxproj]
